boardgame.name: L5R
Legend of the Five Rings
Leyenda de los Cinco Anillos
boardgame.description: A collectible card game, set in a fantasy empire called Rokugan, based loosely upon medieval Japan and Japanese Mythology._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The factions available have changed over the editions, but generally include the 7 Great Clans: Crab, Crane, Dragon, Lion, Phoenix, Scorpion, and Unicorn. Each has specific thematic elements, which are consistent across editions and descendant games. The other currently legal factions include the Spider, Mantis, and an unaligned ronin stronghold._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Rokugan setting has been changed over the years by participation in the storyline tournaments for the L5R CCG._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Legend of the Five Rings is different from other collectible card games due to the concept of Clan loyalty. The Clans of the game are what you build your deck around, and the communities that have built up around the Crane Clan, Lion Clan, etc are the backbone of the game. When you say _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;I'm a Crab player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; you instantly find yourself with hundreds and thousands of clan-mates who are there to help you become a better player. When one member of the Clan wins, all benefit._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;L5R was the first CCG to introduce cards that players directly influenced. These are still a core part of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The L5R CCG has spun off a number of related games: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Clan War, a miniatures game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Diskwars: Legend of the Five Rings, a Rokugan-themed set of the Diskwars tabletop combat game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Unpublished Prototype, an as-yet unpublished wargame set in Rokugan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Legend of the Five Rings Roleplaying Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As of 2006, only the CCG and Clan War have had storyline tournaments. Though the RPG players have been heavily involved in the ongoing plot in recent years._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In 2008, L5R held the first _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Mega-Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; which incorporated various methods of competition for the Clans and their supporters, not only in CCG form, but in contests (art, writing, poster-design, etc.), community work (charity, fundraising, food-drives), and more. The Dragon Clan ultimately won the first mega-game, and as such earned the privilege of having the next Empress come from their clan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In 2009, L5R released its first graphic novel, Death at Koten, which also included exclusive story-themed cards for the CCG._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Also in 2009, L5R released The Imperial Gift the first completely free expansion in CCG history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In 2010 L5R celebrated its 15th Anniversary with many major events, new prizes, more free cards, and a special flashback set that brought back some of the most popular cards in the history of the game. 2010 also saw the largest World Championships event at Gen Con in the past 7 years._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2011 saw the release of War of Honor, an all new tile-based multiplayer format for L5R that comes with 4 pre-constructed decks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In september 2015, AEG and Fantasy Flight Games announced that FFG had bought the L5R brand from AEG and will relaunch the card game as a LCG (non-collectible), with significant rules changes and a new design. The game is to go on hiatus following the release of Evil Portents, the final expansion from AEG, and will be relaunched at Gencon 2017. FFG has also plans to continue the RPG at some point (in what form and with which ruleset is yet unknown)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

You are buying my personal Legend of the Five Rings Collection with over 500 cards. These cards are in mint condition and have only been played sleeved. When Emperor Edition came out I got in to this game. Sadly I am finding that I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have time to play this game anymore. Its a great game but I feel I can not give it the attention it deserves. I still have so much to learn and I hope to come back to the game later. It kills me to see this collection siting in my game room not getting played or looked at. I would like these cards to go to a good home (a Crab player would be best). I may not play this game anymore but I will always be a Crab! Collection includes: Complete Forgotten Legacy Set Crab Clan Emperor Edition Starter (Sleeved) Lion Clan Emperor Edition Starter (Sleeved) NOTE: The cards that came in the starter are in the collection but I have since changed up the deck onto a more competitive Berzerker deck thanks to Forgotten Legacy. 33 Raras (Ranging from $1 - $20) Also lots of Uncommon and Commons (from booster packs form all the current sets) And a few promo cards... NOTE: The binder in the photo will not be included but the cards in it will be. :) Listing of Rare Cards: Akodo Kano, Kakita Munemori, Iuchi Shunshi, Unmei, Yoritomo Hama, Soshi Yorimi, Yung, Rebuilding the Empire, Bayushi Rentatsu, Seaside Bazaar, The Trap is Sprung, Superior Reach, Feign Death, Rumors Travel, Favors, Twist of Fate, Anger Management, At Any Cost, Effortless Counterattack, Strength of the Tsunami, Walking the Way, The Crimson Mark, Isawa Norimichi, Mirumoto Yozo, Togashi Sakata, I give you my Name, Lady Matsu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Rage, Hiromi_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Vassals, Detained, Champion of Thunder, Amazing Feat, Your Clan Needs You, Iron Will, Isawa Kaname, Traveling Peddler, Fukuzo, Shinden Shorai. Let me know if you have any questions.

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG16800) In the provinces of the Lion Clan, the peace of the plains is shattered by the appearance of an oni, a monstrosity from the Realm of Evil. Once the beast is defeated, at the cost of many samurai_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s lives, the Lion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s ire turns to the Crab Clan. Are the Crab not the guardians who protect the Empire from such nightmares? Surely such a terrible thing would never have occurred if the Lion had stood guard over the Carpenter Wall. Ill will turns to bold words, and bold words soon turn to bloodshed. With the two greatest armies of the Empire at one another_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s throats, who will emerge victorious? A Matter of Honor is the ultimate Learn to Play Set for the Legend of the Five Rings Collectible Card Game, featuring the streamlined and comprehensive rules of Ivory Edition. Discover the game and delve into its rich history as a member of the stalwart Crab Clan or the proud Lion Clan, and in doing so get ready to face the challenges that lay ahead of the samurai of the Emerald Empire of Rokugan in the years to come!

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG16410) Legend of the Five Rings is the premiere interactive storyline Collectible Card Game. Featuring tales of epic Samurai adventure as the Empire of Rokugan expands its boundaries. Catalog Text With the stress of the Dark Naga_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s guerilla war against the Empire and the terrible things unleashed by the rampant exploration of the Colonies, relations between the two lands have become strained almost to the breaking point. In an effort to determine the extent of the degradation in honor by the Colonials, the Emerald Champion deploys one of her Imperial Legions to investigate, but pride on the part of both sides quickly leads to conflict. Emperor Edition: Gempukku is the reprint of the most recent base set for the fan-favorite Legend of the Five Rings Collectible Card Game from AEG: Emperor Edition. Gempukku is the rite of passage into adulthood in Rokugan and as such, starter and booster decks are specifically made for new players, while still holding value for existing ones! Join Legend of the Five Rings, as the Empress struggles to keep a firm hold over the Empire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s new territories. -224 card starter decks with Common and Uncommon cards from the entire Emperor Edition Arc, as well as 2 exclusive cards for each of the 9 Clans of the Emerald Empire! -6 card booster packs, exclusively made of rares from all the expansions from the Emperor Arc! -Great art from acclaimed artists in the industry, bringing both Rokugan and the Colonies to life. -The rift between the mainland and the Colonies continues to increase as Imperial forces are dispatched to the Second City!

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG16210) With the Empire continually distracted by the conflict with the Dark Naga, the samurai in the distant Colonies slip farther from the traditions of their homeland and embrace more pragmatic means of accomplishing their duties. Championing this new philosophy are the proscribed texts of Fudo, an ancient and censored prophet of the Brotherhood of Shinsei. Seeds of Decay is the brand new expansion for the fan-favorite Legend of the Five Rings Collectible Card Game from AEG. It is part of the Emperor Edition Arc, which acclaimed base set released in the beginning of 2012. Far away from the eyes of the Empire, tensions grow between the Clans in the Colonies, as once forbidden texts re-emerge. The seed has been planted. Will the Clans embrace this new philosophy? Featuring Dragon, Mantis and Scorpion Clan starter decks. 159 total new cards legal for the Emperor Arc, including 1 exclusive fixed card and a theme-oriented Stronghold in each Starter Deck and L5R_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s 10,000th card! -Incredible art from renowned artists in the industry, highlighting the increasing differences between the Empire and the Colonies. Conflict rages on between the Clans in the Colonies as they vie for supremacy over a new land with little Imperial supervision.

Two long boxes with about 2000 cards. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know the game, and these were a random second-hand acquisition, so I really don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what for this game. There are a couple foils. There are also four cards with counting wheels in them. (I assume these are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;life counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for the four different houses shown.) One box is marked _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gold and Spirit Wars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, but no guarantee that has anything to do with the contents. Overall, the cards look to be in very good condition. (I wish I knew how to play; the artwork is awesome!) I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not going to sort through these. Whatever is in there, is what you get. Take a chance! Or make an offer! These are heavy, so shipping is going to be expensive, UNLESS you have a business address I can ship to. In that case, I can do FedEx Ground for typically $8 or less. Otherwise, I will probably repack these into a USPS Flat Rate box.
